Beauty Under Capitalism
Black owned Latinx owned MENA owned Asian owned Cancelled

Black women owned cruelty-free beauty brands (B.O.M.B.)

The cruelty-free status of these brands is based on the Logical Harmony database and my own research. Most products recommended to try are vegan (or otherwise explicitly noted) and made without known irritants, but please look over the ingredients before purchasing!

Alikay Naturals

organic Haircare and bodycare inspiring everyone to embrace their natural beauty, accessible everywhere. Try their bundled product collections for cleansing, conditioning, protection, and styling treatments that fit together.

Owned by founder and CEO, YouTube influencer Rochelle Alikay Graham-Campbell.

A.P.D.G

Cosmetics designed to withstand heat and humidity of the U.S. South. Try their liquid face pigment foundation available in sixteen deep shades.

Owned by Alquemie Group, which is owned and founded by CEO Rhonda Davis.

Ayele

Skincare and Cosmetics for women of every color, started by a college student. Try their Sunflower Sweets Serum for retaining elasticity and fading hyperpigmentation.

Owned by founder and CEO Danielle Bahi.

Beauty Bakerie

Cosmetics with a sweet spin. Try their ultra-long-wearing matte Lip Whips or Flour setting powders.

Owned by founder and CEO Cashmere Nicole in San Diego, CA.

Bee-Q-Box

handcrafted Cosmetics with a badass twist, started by a college student. Try their illuminating setting sprays aptly and originally named ‚ÄúF*ckboy Repellent‚Äù.

Owned by founder and CEO Brianna Queen.

Benu Cosmetics

vegan handcrafted Skincare celebrating diversity in people and skin. Try their hero product made with fresh flower petals, Hello Skin Serum.

Owned by founder and CEO Mena Nwabenu in Chicago, IL.

BGLH Marketplace

handcrafted Cosmetics with a sweet spin. Try their adorable heart-shaped African Black Soap or flagship whipped butters.

Owned by founder and CEO, black girl with long hair Leila Noelliste in Brooklyn, NY.

BLAC Mineral Cosmetics

Cosmetics made naturally for women of color. Try their yellow-based cream concealers formulated for medium to deep skin tones.

Owned by founder and CEO Merced Boyce.

Briogeo

Inspired, diverse, clean, and transparent Haircare. Try their best-selling scalp detoxifying treatment or fan-favorite Rosarco line.

Owned by founder and CEO Nancy Twine in NYC.

Camille Rose Naturals

Body and Haircare for the conscious consumer. Try their nourishing and softening Curl Definers & Butters.

Owned by founder and CEO Janell Stephens.

Cream and Coco

handcrafted Haircare, skincare, and bodycare offering a moment of comfort in the chaos life can bring. Try their Gooseberry Aloe Hair Pudding to nourish curls while giving definition, body, hold, and shine.

Owned by founder and CEO, biochemist Victoria Brown.

Curl Junkie

Haircare designed to be the brand every person with textured hair can‚Äôt live without. Try their Repair Me! protein treatment for weak, brittle, or chemically damaged hair.

Owned by founder and CEO Marsha Coulton.

Danessa Myricks Beauty

Cosmetics from the mindset of the makeup artist. Try their versatile Colorfix 24-Hour Matte Cream Colors.

Owned by founder and CEO, celebrity makeup artist Danessa Myricks.

The Doux

Haircare designed to give a salon-worthy look between regular salon visits. Try their Mousse Def Texture Foam to define and control your style with a light hold.

Owned by founder and CEO Maya Smith in Macon, GA.

Earth‚Äôs Nectar

Haircare inspired by natural curls. Try their aloe-based Honey Curls styling gel.

Owned by founder and CEO Tamika Fletcher.

Fashion Fair

Cosmetics addressing Black women‚Äôs needs since 1973. Try their buildable coverage Foundation Stick.

Owned by Johnson Publishing Company, which is owned by CEO (and White House Social Secretary under President Obama) Desir√©e Rogers founded by the late co-founder of Ebony and Jet magazines Eunice W. Johnson.

Fenty Beauty

Cosmetics built on inclusivity. Try their glistening Killawatt Highlighters or Stunna Lip Paints.

50%-owned by Kendo Holdings (owned by LVMH, not a cruelty-free company) ; 50%-owned by üáßüáß Rihanna.

Foxie Bombs

Made for multiple uses, 100% vegan handcrafted skin, bath, body, and hair care. Try their face products made for all skin types or bath soaks.

Owned by founder and CEO Kayla Phillips in Nashville, TN.

Ginger + Liz

100% vegan non-toxic handcrafted Nail care. Try their smooth and opaque nail lacquers.

Owned by founders Ginger Johnson and Liz Pickett.

Girl + Hair

Haircare to treat natural or relaxed hair in protective styles, naturally. Try their complete set for your new routine.

Owned by founder and CEO Dr. Camille Verovic.

The Glamatory

Cosmetics sold at the flagship shop and studio. Try their vegan Lip Potions¬† or mink lashes.

Owned by founder and CEO, celebrity makeup artist Mimi Johnson in Atlanta, GA.

Gold Label Cosmetics

Cosmetics supporting the ambitious beauty enthusiast. Try their unique, paraben-free matte lip pens.

Owned by founder Kristen Elise Brown.

Heritage 1933

Skin, bath, and haircare to challenge society‚Äôs narrow perception of beauty. Try their whipped moisturizer with coconut oil and mango butter made for hair and body.

Owned by founder and CEO LaToya Thompson in St. Louis, MO.

Hue Noir

Cosmetics putting multicultural women at the center of the modern beauty movement. Try their True Hues foundation in a patent-pending long-wear formula, designed especially for women of color.

Owned by founder and CEO, chemist Paula Hayes in Portland, OR.

Jacque Mgido

Cosmetics specifically made to address makeup challenges in Sub-Saharan Africa. Try their Brow Pen for realistic hair-like strokes.

Owned by founder and CEO üáøüáº Jackie Mgido.

Jane Carter Solution

Haircare for all hair types and textures using the best ingredients available. Try their protecting leave-in conditioner to seal in moisture, especially for dry, fragile, color treated or relaxed hair.

Owned by founder and CEO Jane Carter.

JD Glow

handcrafted Cosmetics focused on metallic glow and pigment for all ethnicities. Try their Metallon single shadows in highly metallic foil finishes.

Owned by founders Deandra Craig and Jennifer Clifton in Baton Rouge, LA.

Juvia‚Äôs Place

Cosmetics designed to be vibrant and affordable. Try their oversized pans of richly pigmented eyeshadows.

Owned by founder and CEO üá≥üá¨ Chichi Eburu.

Kami Cosmetics

Cosmetics for the sophisticated, chic, and bold woman. Try their best-selling matte liquid lipsticks.

Owned by founder and CEO Kameka Barrett.

Ka`oir

Cosmetics built around luscious lips. Try their Lip Pop — shade ‚ÄúTake It Off‚Äù was responsible for Keyshia‚Äôs nude lip at her wedding.

Owned by founder and CEO Keyshia Ka'oir.

Kaylux

Made in the USA Cosmetics made with love. Try their highlighting body oil for all-over shimmer and hydration.

Owned by founder and CEO, beauty influencer Kaylar Will.

Koils By Nature

Haircare to enhance your natural beauty. Try their nourishing hair + body butters.

Owned by founder and CEO, U.S. Army veteran Pamela J. Booker.

Koyvoca

handcrafted Cosmetics exclusively for brown beauties. Try their Contour Creams made only for medium to deep dark skin tones.

Owned by founder and CEO Courtney Coates.

Lamik Beauty

Eco-chic Cosmetics and skincare. Try their inclusive brow kit featuring an angled brush with spoolie, highlighting creme, and brow powder.

Owned by founder and CEO Kim Roxie in Houston, TX.

Laws of Nature Cosmetics

organic non-toxic vegan Cosmetics for women of color. Try their silicone-free mineral foundations in several finishes, formulas, and 15 shades.

Owned by founder and CEO Jasmine Rose.

Lena Lashes

Cosmetics centered around luxury lashes. Try their luxe, invisible-band falsies in mink or synthetic.

Owned by founder and CEO Marlene Aymone.

The Lip Bar

Cosmetics exploring beauty through diversity and fun. Try their lipsticks made with hydrating shea butter, coconut oil, avocado oil and vitamin E.

Owned by founder and CEO Melissa Butler.

Lipmatic

organic Cosmetics centered only on the lips. Try their earthy nude shade Brooklyn Brownstone.

Owned by founder and CEO Destiny Jones.

Lotus Moon

vegan organic Skincare made because fresh ingredients feel better. Try their cleansing gels designed for each skin type and pH level or products from their sister brand.

Owned by founder and CEO Lake Louise.

Magnolia Makeup

Cosmetics devoted to filling a pigmented void in the cosmetic industry. Try their loose pigment eye shadows inspired by their vibrant hometown.

Owned by founders Niala and Tia Howard in New Orleans, LA.

MDM Flow

Cosmetics inspired by hip-hop, designed for black skin. Try their Mas Marina semi-matte lipstick in their signature black & gold packaging.

Owned by founder and CEO, cosmetic scientist Florence “Flow” Adepoju.

Mented Cosmetics

vegan non-toxic Cosmetics that enhance the natural beauty of women of all hues. Try their flagship lip products meant to give a perfect nude for women of color.

Owned by founders KJ Miller and Amanda E. Johnson.

Mielle Organics

organic Haircare encouraging healthier hair with healthier ingredients. Try their Babassu Oil line for strengthening protein and nourishing moisture.

Owned by founder Monique Rodriguez.

Miss Jessie‚Äôs

Haircare for styling curly, kinky, and wavy hair of all types and textures. Try their Leave-In Condish for lightweight styling prep.

Owned by founders Miko Branch and her late sister Titi.

Nuban Beauty

Cosmetics designed affordably and specially for the African woman. Try their Pro Blending beauty sponges for flawless and stress-free application or mini matte lippies.

Owned by founders üá≥üá¨ CEO Stella Ndekile and celebrity makeup artist Jane Ogu in Nigeria.

Oyin Handmade

100% handcrafted Haircare. Try their herbal, humectant leave-in conditioners.

Owned by founder and CEO Jamyla Bennu in Baltimore, MD.

Plain Jane Beauty

vegan organic Cosmetics encompassing all shades and tones using natural ingredients. Try their 85% organic vegan creme foundation or products from their sister brand.

Owned by founder and CEO Lake Louise.

Pnk Digger

vegan handcrafted Cosmetics focused on lips. Try their unique, hydrating, three-in-one metallic lipglosses.

Owned by founder and CEO Stephanie Bennett.

Sienna Naturals

Haircare and skincare — effective, natural products for textured hair and dry skin. Try their shea butter and grapeseed oil split end eliminating serum.

Owned by founder and CEO Hannah Diop.

Soap Distillery

handcrafted Bath and bodycare inspired by the scents of spirits and cocktails. Try their booze-free, seasonal & small-batch subscription box.

Owned by founder and CEO Danielle Martin in Chicago, IL.

Soultanicals

vegan non-toxic handcrafted Haircare and bodycare products that are soul-infused and melanin-inspired. Try their best-selling Knot Sauce coil detangler.

Owned by founder and CEO Ayo Ogun-McCants in Queen Creek, AZ.

tgin (Thank God It‚Äôs Natural)

organic Haircare designed to kiss dryness goodbye. Try their for natural hair needing repair Honey Miracle Deep Conditioner.

Owned by founder Chris-Tia Donaldson.

Unsun Cosmetics

Skincare made to protect all complexions. Try their Tinted Mineral Sunscreen with 30 SPF and no white cast or ashy tone.

Owned by founder and CEO (and Frank Ocean‚Äôs mom!) Katonya Breaux Riley.

Vera Moore Cosmetic

Cosmetics and skincare made affordably, from dark to light. Try their skincare signature collection of moisturizing peptide formulas.

Owned by founder and CEO, former actress Vera Moore.

Wonder Curl

Haircare to give people with curly hair great hair days, every day. Try their sampler pack to kickstart your new routine.

Owned by founder and CEO Scarlett Rocourt.

Other black owned brands

The following brands are not majority women-owned (either by founding or through an exit) and/or test on animals where required by law.

AJ Crimson Beauty

Cosmetics for multicultural complexions. Try their nude lipsticks made just for women of color or Flour setting powders.

Owned by founder and CEO AJ Crimson in San Diego, CA.

FORM Beauty

Haircare for all textures, for people of all ethnic backgrounds. Try their customized regimen just for your hair.

Owned by Walker & Company, which is owned and founded by CEO Tristan Walker.

IMAN Cosmetics

Cosmetics specifically for multicutural women since 1994. Try their award-winning, moisturizing Skin Tone Evener BB Creme.

Owned by Impala Inc, founded by supermodel Iman.

Pat McGrath Labs

Cosmetics where unadulterated experimentation meets raw glamour. Tested on animals when required by law. Try their Mothership eyeshadow palettes or luxe Mattetrance Lipsticks.

Owned by founder and CEO, global makeup artist Pat McGrath.

True Moringa

Skincare that serves 2,500 small family farmers across Ghana. Try their for face, hair, and body 100% pure cold-pressed moringa oil.

Co-owned by Co-founder Kwami Williams.
